Subjects: Virgin Mary, joys of; carols, Annunciation
_description: A macaronic song of the Five Joys — five quatrains (aaab) with Latin caudae and ‘Nowel’ burden: ‘Nowel el el el el el el el el el el / Mary was gret with gabriel’

BLSl2593.First Lines:
Mary moder meke & myldeFro schame & synne þat ye vs
                    schyllde…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…The aungele wern glad quan þou were comeIn celi
                        palacio
